programme.title: NFL Game Re-Airs
programme.desc: Davante Adams caught nine passes from Aaron Rodgers for 198 yards and two touchdowns - all in the second half - and the Jets rallied to beat the Jacksonville Jaguars 32-25 to end a four-game skid Sunday.

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Cleveland Browns
programme.sub-title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Cleveland Browns
programme.desc: As training camp begins for the 2018 Cleveland Browns, all eyes are on the NFL's No. 1 overall draft pick and future of the franchise, quarterback Baker Mayfield; evaluations begin as 90 players vie for 53 coveted spots on the starting roster.

programme.title: NFL Game Re-Airs
programme.desc: New England Patriots had rookie QB Drake Maye back after being knocked out of last week's win over the Jets and used his legs, running for a career-best and team-high 95 yards.

programme.title: NFL Game Re-Airs
programme.desc: Baker Mayfield set a Browns rookie record with four touchdown passes in another growing-up-fast performance, and Cleveland ended one of the NFL's longest streaks of road futility on Sunday with a 35-20 victory.

programme.desc: Bryce Young passed for three touchdowns, ran for two scores and led a 70-yard drive capped by Miles Sanders' 1-yard TD run on the opening possession of overtime to give Carolina a 44-38 win over Atlanta.
